member.name: T:EasyLife.Web.EasyLifeNavigationProvider
member.summary: This class defines menus for the application. It uses ABP's menu system. When you add menu items here, they are automatically appear in angular application. See Views/Layout/_TopMenu.cshtml file to know how to render menu.

member.name: T:EasyLife.Web.Controllers.EasyLifeControllerBase
member.summary: Derive all Controllers from this class.
